description: MeritTrac is a 100% subsidiary of Manipal Global Education (MaGE) which is one of the largest and highly rated education services providers. As a leader in assessments, MeritTrac has been leveraging its ISO certified processes in transforming the way assessments are managed and delivered in India. MeritTrac offers high levels of reliability, quality and security for consistently delivering large assessments. In addition to delivering assessments in the Computer based and Paper based mode, MeritTrac offers assessment services.

enhanced_description: MeritTrac, a 100% subsidiary of Manipal Global Education (MaGE), is a premier assessment company based in India. It offers an all-in-one assessment platform that leverages ISO certified processes to deliver reliable, high-quality, and secure assessments. These assessments can be delivered in computer-based and paper-based modes, catering to large-scale requirements. MeritTrac focuses on transforming assessment management and delivery, providing services for workforce development (identifying skill gaps and leadership abilities), recruitment assessment (evaluating candidate skills across the employee lifecycle), and cognitive assessment (evaluating ability to learn new concepts).
